a.n: The Teacher 4: Katie St. Ives & Manuel Ferrara

p.k: Physicist Manuel Ferrara is on the verge of solving physics? biggest mysteries, and smitten young students treat him like a rock star. Obsessive young math major Katie St. Ives is falling dangerously in love with the gorgeous professor. As Manuel realizes there's only one way to save Katie from the brink of madness, he struggles with his own unbearable lust. A SweetSinner film.
